item.title: Projects
item.description: ladida check this out: Mountains. Projects to talk about: Learning 3D Pointcloud Descriptors for Robust Localization: In this project I worked on learning desriptors robust to changes in viewpoint, illumination and deformation by incorporating geometric and semantic information. I explored a variety of methods to improve the baseline of 3D descriptors using deep neural networks such as 3D convolutional neural nets, graph convolutional neural nets to deal with the inherent problem of permutation invariance when dealing with 3D pointclouds (effectively sets).
